channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Author Geraldine Brooks learned some hard personal-finance lessons when her husband died unexpectedly
item.description: “Memorial Days” is a memoir of grief, but also a practical reminder of the impact of money on anyone’s life.

item.title: Women are earning and inheriting more than ever — they need better advice
item.description: Many financial advisers make outdated assumptions about how women live, earn and invest

item.title: Home-buying incentives to increase in coming months, D.R. Horton says
item.description: D.R. Horton’s stock surges after profit and new home orders beat expectations, but sales incentives are likely to increase to boost demand.

item.title: 10 dividend stocks with yields up to 6.92% and plenty of cash flow for higher payouts
item.description: Free cash flow yields show plenty of headroom for these companies to increase their dividends.

item.title: A ChatGPT ‘router’ that automatically selects the right OpenAI model for your job appears imminent
item.description: Like going to the supermarket and staring at aisles of cereal and sauces, the average ChatGPT user is currently faced with an overabundance.

item.title: Crowdstrike’s massive cyber outage 1-year later: lessons enterprises can learn to improve security
